title: Middle East Crisis: Israel Urges Gaza City Residents to Evacuate, Calling It a ‘Combat Zone’
content: The Israeli military told Palestinians across the city to move south through four “safe corridors,” a sign that the renewed fighting there would likely continue.
summary: The Israeli military told Palestinians across the city to move south through four “safe corridors,” a sign that the renewed fighting there would likely continue.

title: Three West African Countries Exit Regional ECOWAS Bloc
content: Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger are withdrawing from a 49-year-old regional alliance that has allowed goods and nearly 400 million people to travel freely across a tightly connected region.
summary: Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger are withdrawing from a 49-year-old regional alliance that has allowed goods and nearly 400 million people to travel freely across a tightly connected region.

title: French Elections Show Battle for Europe’s Political Soul
content: A coarsening of public discourse and contempt for mainstream parties have politicians on both sides denouncing what they say are extreme positions by their opponents, analysts say.
summary: A coarsening of public discourse and contempt for mainstream parties have politicians on both sides denouncing what they say are extreme positions by their opponents, analysts say.

title: Rwanda Says It Doesn’t Have to Repay UK for Scrapped Migration Plan

title: Russian Court Orders Arrest of Navalny’s Widow, Yulia Navalnaya
